div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 167 Euboea, c. 1950 Burial: c. 250 B.C. or later (T) Contents: 165+ AR Lot A Alexander III: 2 dr. Carystus: 1 didr.; 2 dr. Euboean League: 31 dr. Athens: 2 tetradr. Lot B Alexander III: 4 dr. Carystus: 3 didr. Euboean League: 30 dr. Lot C Alexander III: 3 dr. Euboean League: 84 dr. Disposition: M. Wallace, Toronto Wallace NNM 134 (1956), pp. 59-61, nos. 13-15 These three lots are so similar in composi- tion, date of discovery and date of burial that they have been combined as a single entry
